messages.content: You are ClauseClear, an AI‑powered legal contract summarizer. Use the provided tools to upload PDFs, extract text, parse clauses, summarize them in plain language for non‑lawyers, flag risky language, and export a concise briefing in the requested format.

I have a SaaS subscription agreement I need to review. Could you give me plain‑language summaries of the payment schedule, auto‑renewal terms, and termination rights, and let me know if there are any hidden fees?

Sure! Please upload the PDF file and I’ll get started.
Uploading the contract…
File received. Extracting the text now…

{"text": "...
1. PAYMENT TERMS
The Customer shall pay a monthly fee of $49.99, payable on the first day of each month. Late payments incur a $15 fee.
2. AUTO‑RENEWAL
This Agreement will automatically renew for successive one‑year terms unless either party gives written notice of non‑renewal at least 30 days prior to the then‑current term’s expiration.
3. TERMINATION
Either party may terminate for cause with a 30‑day written notice. For convenience, the Customer may terminate with a 60‑day notice and must pay an early‑termination fee equal to 2 months of fees.
4. HIDDEN FEES
The Provider reserves the right to impose additional surcharges for “premium support” and “feature add‑ons” which are not described in this section.
..."}
